panels.brickConf: {"brick":"chart-v2.gauge-chart","properties":{"showCard":false,"height":100,"yField":"percent","thresholdColors":[{"value":50,"color":"#0086FA"},{"value":90,"color":"#FFBF00"},{"value":100,"color":"#F5222D"}],"axis":{"yAxis":{"min":0,"max":100,"unit":"%"}}},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-select","args":[{"model":"<% \"easyops.\" + PARAMS.get(\"objectId\") %>","statements":[{"name":"redis_memory_used_percent","alias":"redis_memory_used_percent"}],"filters":[{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${QUERY.instanceId|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"now-5m"},{"name":"redis_memory_used_percent","operator":"!=","value":null}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}],"limit":{"limit":1}}],"transform":{"data":[{"item":"内存使用率","percent":"<% _.get(DATA.list, \"[0].redis_memory_used_percent\") %>"}]},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
panels.title: 内存使用率

panels.brickConf: {"brick":"chart-v2.time-series-chart","properties":{"height":230,"xField":"time","yFields":["redis_commands_processed_rate"],"axis":{"yAxis":{"min":0}}},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-query","args":[{"model":"<% \"easyops.\" + PARAMS.get(\"objectId\") %>","dims":["time(5m)"],"measures":[{"name":"redis_commands_processed_rate","function":{"expression":"avg","args":["redis_commands_processed_rate"]}}],"filters":[{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${QUERY.instanceId|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"${QUERY.from=\"now-1h\"|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":"<=","value":"<% parseInt(+moment() / 1000) %>"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}]}],"transform":{"data":"@{list}"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
panels.title: 命令处理速率

panels.brickConf: {"brick":"chart-v2.time-series-chart","properties":{"height":230,"xField":"time","yFields":["redis_keyspace_hits_rate","redis_keyspace_misses_rate"],"axis":{"yAxis":{"min":0}}},"lifeCycle":{"useResolves":[{"provider":"providers-of-data-exchange.olap-api-query","args":[{"model":"<% \"easyops.\" + PARAMS.get(\"objectId\") %>","dims":["time(5m)"],"measures":[{"name":"redis_keyspace_hits_rate","function":{"expression":"avg","args":["redis_keyspace_hits_rate"]}},{"name":"redis_keyspace_misses_rate","function":{"expression":"avg","args":["redis_keyspace_misses_rate"]}}],"filters":[{"name":"instanceId","operator":"==","value":"${QUERY.instanceId|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":">=","value":"${QUERY.from=\"now-1h\"|string}"},{"name":"time","operator":"<=","value":"<% parseInt(+moment() / 1000) %>"}],"order":[{"name":"time","order":"desc"}]}],"transform":{"data":"@{list}"},"onReject":{"transform":{"error":"<% DATA.message || '接口请求错误' %>"}}}]}}
